snippet.title: NAIRI: Tower of Shirin - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
NAIRI: Tower of Shirin is a cute graphic adventure with adorable visuals, compelling characters and engaging puzzles! 

Coming to Steam and the Nintendo Switch soon!

For more info, check out: 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfile... http://homebearstudio.com/ 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/... 
https://www.facebook.com/nairigame/ 
https://twitter.com/HomeBearStudio
